fission.build.load_network(config, name=None, remote_root='', sanity_check=True, **kwargs)¶

fission.cmd module¶

class fission.cmd.FissionCMD(user, network, *args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: cmd.Cmd

do_allocate(args)¶

Allocates all Jobs on available Nodes.

do_clear(arg)¶

Clears the Terminal.

do_closecluster(args)¶

Kills all running Jobs on Nodes and deletes the current cluster.

do_exit(arg)¶

Exits the FISSION Terminal.

do_reboot(arg)¶

Reboots all Nodes in network.

do_removedata(arg)¶

Remove data from Nodes.

do_senddata(arg)¶

Transfer Data to Nodes.

do_start(arg)¶

Starts the Jobs on the Nodes.

do_startcluster(args)¶

Start the dispy cluster with all Nodes in the network.

do_status(arg)¶

Display cluster status.

do_stop(arg)¶

Stop current computation.

emptyline()¶

Called when an empty line is entered in response to the prompt.

If this method is not overridden, it repeats the last nonempty command entered.

file_complete(text, line, begidx, endidx, ending=None)¶

Completer for setxml

intro = "\n    \\033[36m ___ ___ ___ ___ ___ ___  _  _ \\u001b[0m    \n    \\033[36m| __|_ _/ __/ __|_ _/ _ \\| \\| |\\u001b[0m    \n    \\033[36m| _| | |\\__ \\__ \\| | (_) | .` |\\u001b[0m    \n    \\033[36m|_| |___|___/___/___\\___/|_|\\_|\\u001b[0m    \n                                       \nClient started.\nSee a list of commands and an introduction with 'help'"¶
prompt = '\x1b[36mFISSION: \x1b[0m'¶

fission.loader module¶

class fission.loader.CSVLoader¶

Bases: object

load_nodes(csv_path)¶

Try reading nodes from csv. Does not add any nodes on error.

Arguments:

csv_path {str} – csv path

class fission.loader.XMLLoader(ip='pi_id', executable='executable', dependencies='path', input='input', output='output', pipe_id='pipe_id', parameter_tag='parameter', parameter='param', block_size='block_size', block_count='block_count')¶
